page.title: 13PLACE NAMES
page.content: Usually the place names of an area are decided by the City Council,following a theme. { Llanrumney}for example has one area named after writers,eg: Shaw Close, Hazlitt Place.Another area is named after West Country towns,eg:Burnham Avenue,Lynmouth Crescent. { TROWBRIDGE}has many roads named after Welsh towns,eg:Aberdaron Rd. The areas of{LLANEDEYRN }and{PENTWYN were designated in consultation with the developers.They were in the main named after some local feature before development began,hence the names related to woods,plant or land form. Some were named plainly in English,{ {(Roundwood, Chapelwood}). Others were given a Welsh translation,({WAUN FACH- little meadow,{BRYN Y NANT}hill on the stream).There are a few that have no translation,eg:{COED Y GORES}
